PLATA
item.description: The objective of the PLATA project is to develop educational prototypes to digitise the editorial collection of the UDIT Student Residence so that it can be used as teaching material in secondary schools, sixth form colleges and universities, both for classroom use and for independent research work at all levels, including final degree projects and doctoral theses. The project offers the opportunity to digitise the editorial collection in a modern and durable interactive format in line with the current uses of new generations, facilitating consultation and reading through interactive technologies, cloud file consultation and artificial intelligence.
